info:
DJ Cobra (on some sites is used simply Cobra) composed music on ZX Spectrum 128 until year 1998. Most of his songs were used in demos by Speccy Boyz ([url]http://zxdemo.org/author.php?id=422[/url]). 

He used nickname DJ Cobra until the end of Speccy Boyz era, since then he composes electronic music under his own name. But his new production is completely demoscene unrelated.
